readability_reflection: Based on my experience with both string interpolation and string concatenation in the survey I found the string concatenation more readable in the questions were variables were used however the longer questions string interpolation was more readable due to it's syntax being so unique.
comprehension_debugging: No I was able to quickly understand or debug code snippets with either approach. I did find string interpolation's syntax more readable which made longer code faster to read.
preference_rationale: I would prefer string interpolation for future programming tasks because of it's readability.
learning_curve: I've used string concatenation more in the past which might of made it easier to understand and recognize string interpolation better.
